articles.description: The search for victims of a catastrophic blaze that reduced a northern California town to ashes intensified on Thursday and authorities said the list of those reported missing had expanded to more than 600 in the deadliest wildfire in California history.

articles.author: Cnbc
articles.title: FAO Schwarz returns to New York City
articles.description: Three years after closing its flagship location in New York, the 156 year-old toy store FAO Schwarz is opening a new location at Rockefeller Plaza.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Oil prices stable on expected OPEC cuts, but surging US supply drags
articles.description: Oil prices firmed on Friday on the back of expected supply cuts by OPEC, though record U.S. production weighed.
articles.content: Oil prices were stable on Friday, supported by expected supply cuts from OPEC but held back by record U.S. production. U.S. West Texas Intermediate (WTI) crude oil futures were at $56.5/ per barrel at 0132 GMT, up 12 cents from their last settlement. Brent cr… [+2503 chars]

articles.author: CNBC Asia Source
articles.title: FC Barcelona: The Asian market is 'very important' to us
articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping wants to create a healthy soccer market in the country. Oscar Grau of FC Barcelona says his club wants to help Beijing get closer to its goal.

articles.author: Yen Nee Lee
articles.title: Citi says clients are making business adjustments due to trade war
articles.description: Citi polled 64 of their clients and found that more than half have plans to adjust their supply chains, including shifting manufacturing sites or investing in new ones to circumvent further tariffs.
articles.content: The poll, conducted in early November, found that more than half of those companies have plans to adjust their supply chains, which include shifting manufacturing sites or investing in new ones to circumvent additional tariffs that the U.S. and its trading pa… [+845 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: North Korea's Kim inspects testing of newly developed 'tactical' weapon: state media
articles.description: Kim Jong Un said that the weapons system tested was one that his father, Kim Jong Il, was especially interested during his lifetime and led the development of personally.
articles.content: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un inspected the testing of a newly developed tactical weapon, calling it "another display of our rapidly-growing defense capabilities to the whole region," North Korean state media said on Friday. It was the first mention by stat… [+2033 chars]

articles.author: Christine Wang
articles.title: US reportedly looking to prosecute Assange amid increased prospects of bringing him to the US
articles.description: The WikiLeaks founder's relationship with Ecuador has deteriorated in recent months. Assange is currently living in the South American country's embassy in London after Ecuador granted him political asylum.
articles.content: The Justice Department is getting ready to prosecute Julian Assange as the WikiLeaks founder's relationship with Ecuador deteriorates, The Wall Street Journal reported citing people in Washington familiar with the matter. div > div.group > p:first-child… [+658 chars]
